title: Where do I Worship?
description: An app for finding nearby houses of worship - churches, temples, etc.

title: The JavaScript 30
description: The popular 30 day web course, along with my own takes on it.

title: NodeNotes
description: A note taking app...for your browser!

title: Psychic Game
description:
Guess a randomly generated letter.
Your odds may seem low, but you are psychic - right?

title: Boom or Bust
description:
It's kinda like Blackjack, but EXTREME!
A different game every time you play - can you handle it?

title: Tippa
description: An app to calculate how much to tip - as well as how to split the tip amongst friends.

title: JavaSnake
description: The classic Nokia phone game - made in JavaScript!

title: Liri
description: A Siri-esque app that runs in your computer's terminal program.

title: Bamazon
description: A Node.js version of a popular consumer website. Like Liri, runs in terminal.
